      • main

                 throws java.awt.AWTException

      • rotateMouseWheel

        public static void rotateMouseWheel​(int Notches)

        Method for rotating the wheel of the mouse

        Parameters:
        Notches - how many times to rotate, if it is negative it will be rotated upwards, else if positive downwards
        Throws:
        Utils.UnconfiguredRobotException - exception is thrown when the instance of the Robot has not been initialized, configureRobot(~) is called in order to configure the instance of the Robot

      • configureRobot

        public static void configureRobot​(int autodelayPerMs,
                                  boolean waitForIdle)
        Method that must be called before utilizing regarding methods, which also sets some settings of the robot
        Parameters:
        autodelayPerMs - - auto delay to be set
        waitForIdle - - boolean that identifies, whether robot will wait for idle or not

      • mkdirect

        public static void mkdirect​(java.lang.String directory)
                     throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        To create a directory in Java
        P.S Both method mkdir() and mkdirs() are returning a boolean value to indicate the operation status : true if succeed, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        directory - - the path of directory to be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - - if the given parameter directory is null

      • open

        Parameters:
        file - the file to be opened

      • pause

        public static void pause​(int time)
        Method for the parent thread to sleep
        Parameters:
        time - the amount of time to sleep
